Title: Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room
Writer: Bethany McLean (book), Peter Elkind (book), Alex Gibney
Actors: Peter Coyote, John Beard, Barbara Boxer, George W. Bush
Plot: Corporate audio and videotapes tell the inside story of the scandal involving one company's manipulation of California's energy supply and its, and how its executives wrung a billion dollars out of the resulting crisis.
